motivation: To fulfill a destiny they never asked for.
To guide the next generation.
To live life on their own terms.
To overturn a corrupt system.
To uncover a hidden truth.
flaw: Obsessive to the point of self-destruction.

motivation: To protect the innocent.
To create a masterpiece.
To maintain order and prosperity.
flaw: Aloofness and out of touch with their people.

motivation: To find a place to belong.
To expose hypocrisy through humor.
To mend what is broken.
To venture into the unknown.
To live a simple, peaceful life.
To gain power through attraction.
To see the good in everything.
To achieve a noble goal through questionable means.
To expose a devastating truth.
To escape a violent past.
To surpass their master.
flaw: Ruthless and willing to betray others.

motivation: To preserve a dying culture or species.
To break a terrible affliction.
To pull off the ultimate heist.
To broker peace between warring factions.
To avenge a past wrong.
To deliver a message they don't want to believe in.
To support their friend no matter what.
flaw: Blind loyalty, even when it's wrong.

motivation: To create a perfect world.
To endure against all odds.
To push the boundaries of knowledge.
To redeem their past mistakes.
To manipulate events from behind the scenes.
To rise to an occasion they feel unprepared for.
To escape a mundane reality.
To serve a cause with absolute devotion.
To find acceptance.
flaw: Social anxiety and fear of rejection.

motivation: To exploit the greed of others.
To resolve conflict without violence.
flaw: Unprepared for the brutality of others.

motivation: To uphold the rules and regulations.
To risk it all for the ultimate prize.
To find meaning after a devastating loss.
flaw: Reckless disregard for their own safety.

motivation: To preserve and understand the past.
flaw: Lives in the past, neglecting the present.

motivation: To live up to overwhelming expectations.
